snippet: The judicial inquiry investigating ethics in the British press said in a statement Friday that prime ministers past and present would testify next week about their ties with the media.
abstract: Judicial inquiry investigating ethics in the British press following the phone hacking scandal unveils an A-list of politicians who will testify about their ties with the news media, particularly Rupert Murdoch's empire.
lead_paragraph: The judicial inquiry investigating ethics in the British press said in a statement Friday that prime ministers past and present would testify next week about their ties with the media.

headline.seo: British Prime Minister and Top Politicians to Appear at Hacking Inquiry
headline.main: Top British Politicians to Appear at Hacking Inquiry

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
